name: Spicy Thai Noodles
shortDescription: Delicious and spicy Thai noodles with fresh herbs and a flavorful sauce.
longDescription: Experience the authentic taste of Thailand with our Spicy Thai Noodles. Made with the finest ingredients, this dish combines the perfect balance of spice and flavor. It's a must-try for all the Thai cuisine enthusiasts.

name: Mouthwatering Sushi Platter
shortDescription: A delectable sushi platter with a variety of fresh sashimi, rolls, and nigiri.
longDescription: Indulge in our Mouthwatering Sushi Platter, featuring a stunning assortment of sushi delights. From the melt-in-your-mouth sashimi to the perfectly seasoned rice in our rolls and nigiri, it's a sushi lover's dream come true.

name: Hearty Vegetable Soup
shortDescription: A comforting and hearty vegetable soup, perfect for a chilly day.
longDescription: Our Hearty Vegetable Soup is the ultimate comfort food. Packed with fresh vegetables and a savory broth, it's the ideal choice to warm you up on a cold day. It's like a hug in a bowl!

name: Sizzling BBQ Ribs
shortDescription: Tender and sizzling BBQ ribs with a smoky flavor and finger-licking sauce.
longDescription: Get ready for a flavor explosion with our Sizzling BBQ Ribs. Slow-cooked to perfection and smothered in our signature barbecue sauce, these ribs will have you coming back for more. It's barbecue bliss!

name: Chocolate Lovers' Dream Cake
shortDescription: Indulge in a decadent chocolate cake, layered with rich chocolate ganache.
longDescription: For all the chocolate lovers out there, our Chocolate Lovers' Dream Cake is a must-try. Each bite is a journey into the world of deep, dark chocolate. It's the ultimate treat for your sweet tooth.

name: Freshly Brewed Cappuccino
shortDescription: A steaming cappuccino with a perfect balance of espresso, frothy milk, and a sprinkle of cocoa.
longDescription: Start your day right with our Freshly Brewed Cappuccino. Our baristas craft each cup with care, ensuring a delightful coffee experience. The rich espresso, velvety milk, and a touch of cocoa make it a coffee lover's favorite.

name: Savory Margherita Pizza
shortDescription: Classic Margherita pizza with fresh tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella on a thin, crispy crust.
longDescription: Our Savory Margherita Pizza is a timeless classic. The combination of ripe tomatoes, fragrant basil, and creamy mozzarella creates a flavor explosion on a perfectly crisp crust. It's pizza perfection!

name: Zesty Tacos with Guacamole
shortDescription: Zesty and delicious tacos with a generous serving of fresh guacamole on the side.
longDescription: Taco lovers, get ready to be amazed by our Zesty Tacos with Guacamole. Each taco is bursting with flavor, and the guacamole adds the perfect creamy touch. It's a fiesta for your taste buds!
